alert.note: Alert for Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 8:58PM AKST until January 10 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST MONDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches. * WHERE...Skagway, Dyea and Klondike Highway. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Blowing and drifting snow may make removal difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds have decreased some and visibility improved in Skagway, therefore blizzard conditions are no longer occurring. There is a chance snow could mix with freezing rain at times. A change over to rain could happen on Monday and would come with a wind shift to the south. If the wind shift does not happen then additional snow should be expected.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
